description:
Powerwolf = Blood Of The Saints (Limited Edition 2-CD) mp3 320k ak6103 What we got...Blood of the Saints is the fourth studio album by German/Romanian power metal band Powerwolf, released in 2011.

A limited edition of Blood of the Saints included a bonus CD titled The Sacrilege Symphony (And Still the Orchestra Plays), which contained orchestral versions of Powerwolf songs. It was arranged by Dominic G. Joutsen, who previously worked for metal band Heavenwood.
